title: Digital Health/Digital Capitalism Episode 4 Will Davies
description: In episode 4 of the podcast I am talking to Will Davies, the author of The Happiness Industry and The Limits of Neoliberalism. Will tells me about his research into the history of economics and psychology and its influence on public policy. Why do governments and businesses want to make us happy? What's in it for them?
dc:creator: Digital Sociology
